pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, December 15, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Thursday, December 15, 2016:

Ottawa, Ontario

9:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with leaders of the National Indigenous Organizations.

Room 237C
Centre Block
Parliament Hill
Ottawa, Ontario

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity at beginning of the meeting


11:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

Foyer
Centre Block
Parliament Hill
Ottawa, Ontario

Note for media:

  • Open coverage


Media Appearance

9:00 p.m. ET – Live – Interview with Patrice Roy for En Direct avec le premier ministre -Radio-Canada/RDI
